channel.title: Food I Ate on Homepage

item.title: Pulled Pork Torta
item.description: First burger of #portlandburgerweek, the Pulled Pork Torta at the Smokehouse Tavern. Pretty good! Pulled pork is a high- risk food that can either be delicious and flavorful or a disgusting mound of damp, soggy meat. This was, thankfully, the former. Not entirely sure what made it a torta, though.
